title: Coplay
description: Coplay is the best AI assistant for Unity. It lives in the editor, and allows you to make a game with prompts

title: MCP for Unity
description: MCP for Unity connects your LLMs to Unity via MCP. It's the most popular OSS MCP for Unity

title: Legal Cost Calculator
description: Legal Cost Calculator is a mobile tool for lawyers in Trinidad and Tobago to calculate legal fairs after judgements.

title: Shoot Into the Void

description: Guide your missile to take out as much enemies as you can!

title: GeoMatch

img.alt: Player about to match a triangle in GeoMatch with 420 points and 2 out of 3 lives

description: Match the incoming shapes with one of yours! GeoMatch is a fun little game I made in 1 day!
